title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document detailed requirements for the AIRFCPrioritizer tool, including input data sources, prioritization criteria, desired outputs, and integration with existing systems.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including components, data flows, and interfaces, considering scalability, performance, and maintainability.

title: Develop AI Prioritization Model
description: Research and develop the AI model for prioritizing RFCs based on urgency, impact, and alignment with organizational goals.

title: Build Data Integration Components
description: Develop components to integrate with existing data sources and systems to fetch and process RFC data.

title: Create User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the AIRFCPrioritizer tool, including input forms, prioritization results display, and integration with existing systems.

title: Implement Security and Access Controls
description: Develop and implement security measures and access controls to ensure data privacy and system integrity.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure and set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the AIRFCPrioritizer tool.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite to ensure the AIRFCPrioritizer tool functions as expected, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for the AIRFCPrioritizer tool.
